guest_vswitch_type.description: Type of virtual switch used for guest traffic in the cluster.

ovm3_cluster.description: Ovm3 native OCFS2 clustering enabled for cluster.

ovm3_pool.description: Ovm3 native pooling enabled for cluster.

pod.description: Name of the pod in which the cluster belongs to.

public_vswitch_type.description: Type of virtual switch used for public traffic in the cluster.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the cluster belongs to.

public_vswitch_name.description: Name of virtual switch used for public traffic in the cluster.

ovm3_vip.description: Ovm3 vip to use for pool (and cluster).

vms_ip_address.description: IP address of the VSM associated with this cluster.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

guest_vswitch_name.description: Name of virtual switch used for guest traffic in the cluster.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

vms_username.description: Username for the VSM associated with this cluster.

hypervisor.description: Name the hypervisor to be used.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

vms_password.description: Password for the VSM associated with this cluster.
